actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Navigation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Navigation

official_title: A concurrent resolution to express the thanks of the Congress of the United States to those persons who, during the period of October 4 through 6, 1980, directly participated in the rescuing of five hundred and ten people on board the burning passenger vessel Prinsendam off the coast of Alaska.

summary.text: Expresses thanks to those individuals directly participating in the rescue of the people onboard the burning passenger vessel Prinsendam.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to express the thanks of the Congress of the United States to those persons who, during the period of October 4 through 6, 1980, directly participated in the rescuing of five hundred and ten people on board the burning passenger vessel Prinsendam off the coast of Alaska.
